title: Dirty Rice
directions: In cast iron skillet, cook the frozen seasoning blend until browned , add prepared cauliflower risotto and garlic and cook and stir about 2 mins and remove from skillet.
Add ground beef and brown until crumbly.
Add broth, worcestershire sauce, parsley, Creole seasoning, pepper, garlic powder, onion salt, and bay leaf into the browned ground beef. Simmer 2 mins then add cauliflower mixture.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until almost all of the beef broth has been absorbed, 8 to 10 minutes. Stir in green onions and hot sauce. Discard bay leaf before serving.
ingredients: 1 dash hot sauce, or to taste
